itemLabel: Mary Wilson, Baroness Wilson of Rievaulx
itemDescription: British poet, wife of Harold Wilson

wikipedia_page.main: Gladys Mary Wilson, Baroness Wilson of Rievaulx (née Baldwin; 12 January 1916 – 6 June 2018) was an English poet and the wife of Harold Wilson, who twice served as the British prime minister. The first prime ministerial spouse to become a centenarian, she lived to the age of 102 years, 145 days.
